name: Sample and Hold
description:
This algorithm is a simple sample/track and hold utility. A common gate/trigger input controls the sampling/tracking of a number number of signal channels.

There are two modes of operation:

- **‘Sample and hold’** - the output is a sample of the input, taken when the gate/trigger input goes high.

- **‘Track and hold’** - the output follows the input while the gate is high, and freezes when the gate goes low.

specifications.name: Channels
specifications.description: The number of bus channels to process, ranging from 1-8.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Chooses between ‘Sample and hold’ (0) and ‘Track and hold’ (1).
